data.title: Launch Initiative
data.text:
Overview

This module provides power to the backplane and other modules.

Current Status

Layout

Action Items

James May (RIT Student) Update Block Diagram to reflect current design

James May (RIT Student) simulate umbilical switch in LTspice, look at power loss

James May (RIT Student) Assemble BOM & include all components

Create BOM file

Add switcher

Add switcher passives

Add umbilical switch components

Add monitoring components

Add monitoring passives

Add microcontroller

Add microcontroller passives

Add WIZnet

Add WIZnet passives

Add flash memory

Add flash passives

James May (RIT Student) Spec shielded inductors

James May (RIT Student) Complete schematic capture

Complete switcher design

5V switcher

3.3V switcher

Backplane connector

current measure (all 3)

voltage measure

WIZnet

Complete battery/umbilical switch design

Battery/umbilical switch transfer to Billy

Review umbilical switch diode

Umbilical connector choose

33R to wiznet

Arrange top level

Determine MCU pinouts

Programming interface

Add microcontroller & logging circuitry (should be roughly identical to other modules)

Add nc mount holes

Address pins to mcu

Polyfuse & standard fast-blow fuse to battery line (poly rated to trip before fast-blow)

Reverse polarity protection on battery line

Add ESD protection

FETs on wiznet LEDs?

Update backplane connector

Add NCs to MCU

Make power jumper female

REF designators

Fix MCU top level block

Swap to INA219

Volt current sense pins?

James May (RIT Student) Complete layout

Define board shape (including fillets!)

Ensure mounting holes are placed in correct spots

Ensure backplane connector is placed in correct spot

Place components

Calculate power trace widths

set components in meaningful way

Fix layer stackup

Route power traces

Route signal traces

polygon pours

Silkscreen it up (following standards)

Import Ben's DRC

Run DRC until good

James May (RIT Student) Simulate switchers in Webench

James May (RIT Student) Layout Review Updates

Swap out old ESD for new ESD

8mil trace & 8mil spacing compliance

Silkscreen unstupid

Via 1:2 compliance

Nuke ref des?

Make fonts guardians

Ensure all components have jlc number

Fix diff pairs

Tooling holes

Board # JLCJLCJLC

Move crystal

Tooling holes

Via stitch grounds

Un-nuke designators a bit

Silkscreen launch standard compliance

flippy flip switcher circuits?

pull back ground pour?
